Org.OData.Core.V1..@Core.Description: Core terms needed to write vocabularies

Org.OData.Core.V1.ODataVersions.@Core.Description: A space-separated list of supported versions of the OData Protocol. Note that 4.0 is implied by 4.01 and does not need to be separately listed.

Org.OData.Core.V1.SchemaVersion.@Core.Description: Service-defined value representing the version of the schema. Services MAY use semantic versioning, but clients MUST NOT assume this is the case.

Org.OData.Core.V1.Description.@Core.Description: A brief description of a model element

Org.OData.Core.V1.LongDescription.@Core.Description: A lengthy description of a model element

Org.OData.Core.V1.NumericValueException.@Core.Description: Used in place of a property value to annotate a property whose value is not representable according to its numeric type.

@Validation.AllowedValues.@Core.Description: The value is greater than the largest number for the prescribed numeric type
The value is less than smallest number for the prescribed numeric type
The value is not representable in the prescribed numeric type

Org.OData.Core.V1.Messages.@Core.Description: Instance annotation for warning and info messages

target.@Core.Description: A path to the target of the message detail, relative to the annotated instance

Org.OData.Core.V1.IsLanguageDependent.@Core.Description: Properties and terms annotated with this term are language-dependent

Org.OData.Core.V1.Tag.@Core.Description: This is the type to use for all tagging terms

Org.OData.Core.V1.RequiresType.@Core.Description: Terms annotated with this term can only be applied to elements that have a type that is identical to or derived from the given type name

Org.OData.Core.V1.ResourcePath.@Core.Description: Resource path for entity container child, can be relative to xml:base and the request URL

Org.OData.Core.V1.DereferenceableIDs.@Core.Description: Entity-ids are URLs that locate the identified entity

Org.OData.Core.V1.Permissions.$AppliesTo: Property ComplexType TypeDefinition EntityType EntitySet NavigationProperty Action Function

Org.OData.Core.V1.ContentID.@Core.Description: A unique identifier for nested entities within a request.

Org.OData.Core.V1.DefaultNamespace.@Core.Description: Functions, actions and types in this namespace can be referenced in URLs with or without namespace- or alias- qualification.
Org.OData.Core.V1.DefaultNamespace.@Core.LongDescription: Data Modelers should ensure uniqueness of schema children across all default namespaces, and should avoid naming bound functions, actions, or derived types with the same name as a structural or navigational property of the type.

Org.OData.Core.V1.Immutable.@Core.Description: A value for this non-key property can be provided on insert and remains unchanged on update

Org.OData.Core.V1.Computed.@Core.Description: A value for this property is generated on both insert and update

Org.OData.Core.V1.IsURL.@Core.Description: Properties and terms annotated with this term MUST contain a valid URL

Org.OData.Core.V1.AcceptableMediaTypes.@Core.Description: Lists the MIME types acceptable for the annotated entity type marked with HasStream="true" or the annotated stream property

Org.OData.Core.V1.MediaType.@Core.Description: The media type of a binary resource

Org.OData.Core.V1.IsMediaType.@Core.Description: Properties and terms annotated with this term MUST contain a valid MIME type

Org.OData.Core.V1.OptimisticConcurrency.@Core.Description: Data modification requires the use of ETags. A non-empty collection contains the set of properties that are used to compute the ETag.

Org.OData.Core.V1.AdditionalProperties.@Core.Description: Instances of this type may contain properties in addition to those declared in $metadata
Org.OData.Core.V1.AdditionalProperties.@Core.LongDescription: If specified as false clients can assume that instances will not contain dynamic properties, irrespective of the value of the OpenType attribute.

Org.OData.Core.V1.AutoExpand.@Core.Description: The service will automatically expand this navigation property even if not requested with $expand

Org.OData.Core.V1.AutoExpandReferences.@Core.Description: The service will automatically expand this navigation property as entity references even if not requested with $expand=.../$ref

Org.OData.Core.V1.MayImplement.@Core.Description: A collection of qualified type names outside of the type hierarchy that instances of this type might be addressable as by using a type segment.

Org.OData.Core.V1.QualifiedTypeName.@Core.Description: The qualified name of a type in scope.

Org.OData.Core.V1.Ordered.@Core.Description: Collection has a stable order. Ordered collections of primitive or complex types can be indexed by ordinal.

Org.OData.Core.V1.PositionalInsert.@Core.Description: Items can be inserted at a given ordinal index.

Key.@Core.Description: The set of properties that make up this key

Name.@Core.Description: A path expression resolving to a primitive property of the entity type itself or to a primitive property of a complex or navigation property (recursively) of the entity type. The names of the properties in the path are joined together by forward slashes.

Alias.@Core.Description: A SimpleIdentifier that MUST be unique within the set of aliases, structural and navigation properties of the containing entity type that MUST be used in the key predicate of URLs
